Articles.Content: I landed on the mun today!!! OMG yes!
Congratulations on one of the hardest things to do in KSP.

Congratulations on one of the hardest things to do in KSP.

Thanks!

It took me a few months to get a hang of it but it was worth it!
Congrats! You'll be on Duna soon enough, I promise!
Congrats! One of the harder things to land on, but so much fun when you finally get there.

Congrats! You'll be on Duna soon enough, I promise!

Thanks! I'm actually going to setup a colony on the mun, Then head for duna! But the colonies, Gonna be a bit harder!
Always a good feeling when you hit a milestone! Next up, duna then the joolian system, then on to eeloo!
Next up, learn Rendezvous and make a space station, or fulfill Wherner Von Kerman's dreams and go to Duna.

I remember that feeling. :)

Congratulations. How many Kerbals did you lose practicing?

I remember that feeling. :)

Congratulations. How many Kerbals did you lose practicing?

About 20? Lol
Congratulations! A small step for a Kerbal, a huge leap for Kerbalkind! Now you can try to peer further into the solar system... or pay a tribute to Neil.

You're all forgetting about Minmus!

But yeah, congrats on your first MÃƒÂ¼n landing.

Aww man, I remember that feeling of accomplishment from a successful landing The world universe of KSP has plenty of other cool things you can do now - even if there's not much to do yet when you land on other planets

Once you become more proficient at landing and rendezvousing and stuff, you might wanna try out mods like Kethane that give you reasons to set up an awesome base on Gilly

Congratulations, man!!!

Now you just have to get back!

Best of luck on all your future missions!

Congratulations! Its probably one of the hardest things to do at first but once you land once you land once you will keep on landing! I would shoot for minmus next and set a base up there, its alot easier to land on and takes less fuel to orbit from the surface.

Congratulations!

Now the first milestone of your great voyage to the sea of stars. Thousands of millions of world welcome you. May the spirit of Kerbal be with you.
That's one happy looking Kerbal.

oh boy,I remember my first feel when I landed on mun first time.Whee it was like a huge step,exploring another world.

but that doesn't make me happy now >

Anyway,advance to eve,it's a simple planet to get to.

Congratulations!

I really enjoy reading these kinds of posts because I remember how I felt when I did it back in .18. It's like joining the mile high club, only higher and better than s*x.

I landed on the mun today!!! OMG yes!

http://i.imgur.com/wXGXMWZ.jpg

congratulations! there is nothing like that first Mun landing! You can only go up from here!
I landed on the Mun earlier this week, too, but sadly didn't have enough fuel to bring him back I was going to mount a rescue mission, but my game bugged and I lost the whole ship.
Congratulations! I was so happy when I got it right I told all my friends for about a week. I even took photos of the screen and What'sApped it to everyone I know.
I always love seeing new players getting that "New mun" feeling.
I hate to say it but KSP just peaked for you. Nothing is as satisfying as the first Mun landing.
Congratulation. I share yours happyness.
